scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc && npm run tslint
scripts.bundle-android: npm run build && npm run create-android-assets-folder && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundle-ios: npm run build && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle-windows: npm run build && npm run create-assets-folder && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform windows --entry-file index.js --bundle-output windows/MobilePos/ReactAssets/index.windows.bundle --assets-dest windows/MobilePos/ReactAssets --dev=false
